verses.verse: בָּ֣אתִי <S%H935><s%> I am come לְגַנִּי֮ <S%H1588><s%> into my garden אֲחֹתִ֣י <S%H269><s%> my sister כַלָּה֒ <S%H3618><s%> [my] spouse אָרִ֤יתִי <S%H717><s%> I have gathered מוֹרִי֙ <S%H4753><s%> my myrrh עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> along בְּשָׂמִ֔י <S%H1314><s%> my balsam אָכַ֤לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> I have eaten יַעְרִי֙ <S%H3293><s%> my honeycomb עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> along דִּבְשִׁ֔י <S%H1706><s%> with my honey שָׁתִ֥יתִי <S%H8354><s%> I have drunk יֵינִ֖י <S%H3196><s%> my wine עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> along חֲלָבִ֑י <S%H2461><s%> with my milk אִכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> eat רֵעִ֔ים <S%H7453><s%> O friends שְׁת֥וּ <S%H8354><s%> drink וְשִׁכְר֖וּ <S%H7937><s%> yea drink abundantly דּוֹדִֽים׃ <S%H1730><s%> O beloved ס

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְשֵׁנָ֖ה <S%H3462><s%> grow old וְלִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> but my heart עֵ֑ר <S%H5782><s%> waketh ק֣וֹל ׀ <S%H6963><s%> [it is] the voice דּוֹדִ֣י <S%H1730><s%> of my beloved דוֹפֵ֗ק <S%H1849><s%> that knocketh פִּתְחִי־ <S%H6605><s%> [saying] Open לִ֞י אֲחֹתִ֤י <S%H269><s%> to me my sister רַעְיָתִי֙ <S%H7474><s%> my love יוֹנָתִ֣י <S%H3123><s%> my dove תַמָּתִ֔י <S%H8535><s%> my undefiled שֶׁרֹּאשִׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> for my head נִמְלָא־ <S%H4390><s%> is filled טָ֔ל <S%H2919><s%> with dew קְוֻּצּוֹתַ֖י <S%H6977><s%> [and] my locks רְסִ֥יסֵי <S%H7447><s%> with the drops לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> of the night

פָּשַׁ֙טְתִּי֙ <S%H6584><s%> I have put off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֻּתָּנְתִּ֔י <S%H3801><s%> my coat אֵיכָ֖כָה <S%H349><s%> how אֶלְבָּשֶׁ֑נָּה <S%H3847><s%> shall I put it on רָחַ֥צְתִּי <S%H7364><s%> ? I have washed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַגְלַ֖י <S%H7272><s%> my feet אֵיכָ֥כָה <S%H349><s%> how אֲטַנְּפֵֽם׃ <S%H2936><s%> shall I defile

דּוֹדִ֗י <S%H1730><s%> My beloved שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> put in יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> by הַחֹ֔ר <S%H2356><s%> the hole וּמֵעַ֖י <S%H4578><s%> [of the door] and my bowels הָמ֥וּ <S%H1993><s%> were moved עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

קַ֥מְתִּֽי <S%H6965><s%> I rose up אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I לִפְתֹּ֣חַ <S%H6605><s%> to open לְדוֹדִ֑י <S%H1730><s%> to my beloved וְיָדַ֣י <S%H3027><s%> and my hands נָֽטְפוּ־ <S%H5197><s%> dropped מ֗וֹר <S%H4753><s%> [with] myrrh וְאֶצְבְּעֹתַי֙ <S%H676><s%> and my fingers מ֣וֹר <S%H4753><s%> myrrh עֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> [with] sweet smelling עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on כַּפּ֥וֹת <S%H3709><s%> upon the handles הַמַּנְעֽוּל׃ <S%H4514><s%> of the lock

פָּתַ֤חְתִּֽי <S%H6605><s%> I opened אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I לְדוֹדִ֔י <S%H1730><s%> to my beloved וְדוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> but my beloved חָמַ֣ק <S%H2559><s%> had withdrawn עָבָ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> himself [and] was gone נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> my soul יָֽצְאָ֣ה <S%H3318><s%> failed בְדַבְּר֔וֹ <S%H1696><s%> when he spake בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H1245><s%> I sought וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not מְצָאתִ֔יהוּ <S%H4672><s%> him but I could not find קְרָאתִ֖יו <S%H7121><s%> him I called וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָנָֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> him but he gave me no answer

מְצָאֻ֧נִי <S%H4672><s%> found הַשֹּׁמְרִ֛ים <S%H8104><s%> The watchmen הַסֹּבְבִ֥ים <S%H5437><s%> that went about בָּעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city הִכּ֣וּנִי <S%H5221><s%> me they smote פְצָע֑וּנִי <S%H6481><s%> me they wounded נָשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְדִידִי֙ <S%H7289><s%> my veil מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> me the keepers הַחֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H2346><s%> of the walls

הִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> I charge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> you O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּמְצְאוּ֙ <S%H4672><s%> if ye find אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דּוֹדִ֔י <S%H1730><s%> my beloved מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to what תַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> that ye tell ל֔וֹ שֶׁחוֹלַ֥ת <S%H2470><s%> him that I [am] sick אַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> of love אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What דּוֹדֵ֣ךְ <S%H1730><s%> What [is] thy beloved מִדּ֔וֹד <S%H1730><s%> more than [another] beloved הַיָּפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> ess מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What דּוֹדֵ֣ךְ <S%H1730><s%> more than [another] beloved מִדּ֔וֹד <S%H1730><s%> is your beloved שֶׁכָּ֖כָה <S%H3602><s%> that thou הִשְׁבַּעְתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> dost so charge
דּוֹדִ֥י <S%H1730><s%> My beloved צַח֙ <S%H6703><s%> [is] white וְאָד֔וֹם <S%H122><s%> and ruddy דָּג֖וּל <S%H1713><s%> the chiefest מֵרְבָבָֽה׃ <S%H7233><s%> among ten thousand

רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> His head כֶּ֣תֶם <S%H3800><s%> [is as] the most פָּ֑ז <S%H6337><s%> fine gold קְוּצּוֹתָיו֙ <S%H6977><s%> his locks תַּלְתַּלִּ֔ים <S%H8534><s%> [are] bushy שְׁחֹר֖וֹת <S%H7838><s%> [and] black כָּעוֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H6158><s%> as a raven

עֵינָ֕יו <S%H5869><s%> His eyes כְּיוֹנִ֖ים <S%H3123><s%> [are] as [the eyes] of doves עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Beside אֲפִ֣יקֵי <S%H650><s%> by the rivers מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters רֹֽחֲצוֹת֙ <S%H7364><s%> washed בֶּֽחָלָ֔ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk יֹשְׁב֖וֹת <S%H3427><s%> reposed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Beside מִלֵּֽאת׃ <S%H4402><s%> in setting

לְחָיָו֙ <S%H3895><s%> His cheeks כַּעֲרוּגַ֣ת <S%H6170><s%> [are] as a bed הַבֹּ֔שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> of spices מִגְדְּל֖וֹת <S%H4026><s%> flowers מֶרְקָחִ֑ים <S%H4840><s%> [as] sweet שִׂפְתוֹתָיו֙ <S%H8193><s%> his lips שֽׁוֹשַׁנִּ֔ים <S%H7799><s%> [like] lilies נֹטְפ֖וֹת <S%H5197><s%> dropping מ֥וֹר <S%H4753><s%> myrrh עֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> sweet smelling

יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> His hands גְּלִילֵ֣י <S%H1550><s%> rings זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> [are as] gold מְמֻלָּאִ֖ים <S%H4390><s%> set בַּתַּרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> with the beryl מֵעָיו֙ <S%H4578><s%> his belly עֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H6247><s%> [is as] bright שֵׁ֔ן <S%H8127><s%> ivory מְעֻלֶּ֖פֶת <S%H5968><s%> overlaid סַפִּירִֽים׃ <S%H5601><s%> [with] sapphires

שׁוֹקָיו֙ <S%H7785><s%> His legs עַמּ֣וּדֵי <S%H5982><s%> [are as] pillars שֵׁ֔שׁ <S%H8336><s%> of marble מְיֻסָּדִ֖ים <S%H3245><s%> set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְנֵי־ <S%H134><s%> upon sockets פָ֑ז <S%H6337><s%> of fine gold מַרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4758><s%> his countenance כַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> [is] as Lebanon בָּח֖וּר <S%H977><s%> excellent כָּאֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H730><s%> as the cedars

חִכּוֹ֙ <S%H2441><s%> His mouth מַֽמְתַקִּ֔ים <S%H4477><s%> [is] most sweet וְכֻלּ֖וֹ <S%H3605><s%> is wholly מַחֲמַדִּ֑ים <S%H4261><s%> yea he [is] altogether lovely זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This דוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> This [is] my beloved וְזֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> and this רֵעִ֔י <S%H7453><s%> and this [is] my friend בְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem
